layerConsolidation module

class layerConsolidation.Assembler

Bases: object

Content spectra assembler.

abstract assemble(*spectra)

Assembles each content spectra from a document into a single matrix.

class layerConsolidation.Reader

Bases: object

Content spectra reader.

abstract readSpectra()

Reads content spectra from an input file.

class layerConsolidation.SpectraAssembler(outputPath)

Bases: layerConsolidation.Assembler

Content spectra assembler.

Unifies different content spectra of a single corpus.

Attributes:

outputPath (str): Output file for the assembled spectra.

assemble(*spectra)

Assembles each content spectra from a document into a single matrix.

Args:

List(str): List of spectra input paths.

class layerConsolidation.SpectraReader(inputPath)

Bases: layerConsolidation.Reader

Content spectra reader.

Attributes:

inputPath (str): File input path. The input must be a valid jsonl file with the next format:

{«id»: document id, «spectre»: document spectre} …

readSpectra()

Reads a content spectre from the input file.

Yields:

(int, bidimensional list): Content spectre with its corresponding id.
